Topic.Title: Yahoo Will Do a $2 Billion buyback and $1 Billion Dividend

Message.Msg: it's dumb to give us only a $1.00 div. & then drop the price the same amount. i feel they should use it all as a div. or all as a buy back! this is yahoo so when they finally mention how they will distribute it- lets hope they mention when they will do it. they like to keep us guessing!

Message.Title: Big option spread trade in November
Message.Msg: Appears to be a bearish bet on Yahoo, maybe someone knows something coming for earnings. I am long term holder, but someone could have some inside info on earnings but more so on what they will do with cash from Alibaba. Smartest move is a buyback my opinion.

Message.Title: Would your Broker sell stock in a defunct company???... Absolutely
Message.Msg: Hundreds of stocks are listed... and actively traded long after the company is legally deceased. Would you like to know more?

Message.Title: The overpaid Affirmative CEO is setting up Yahoo for failure
Message.Msg: Watch and learn. She set it up that she will make millions when she fails. The late Peter Druckersaid it is a "disturbing trend of capitalism." mayer is going to fail just like greedy Bartz!!! The Americans are slowly learning while millions go into poverty!!!!!!

Topic.Title: does anyone think that the new advertising on yahoo is effective and likly to increase profits noticebly?

Message.Msg: The problem is that one day, Yahoo's advertisers are going to wake up and discover that well over half of the ID's on these boards belong to serial spammers or political posters and most of the remainder belong to people like me (freeloaders) who use Yahoo but never click on an ad, much less pay anything directly to Yahoo. To put it another way, without really stupid advertisers, Yahoo would have real problems!

Topic.Title: does anyone think that the new advertising on yahoo is effective and likly to increase profits noticebly?

Message.Msg: Based on the latest numbers that i have the click on yield is great per click. But the yield of click on versus page views is low.

Message.Title: New Yahoo Sucks
Message.Msg: I don't own Yahoo stock, but I have been a long time user of yahoo, & purposely try to use Google as little as possible, but lately Yahoo is really starting to annoy me, ads that pop up in the middle of the screen, always on the bottom of screen etc... #$%$ new e-mail set up... no one clicks on these ads and if they do its by accidant... everyone I know thinks the same... they are moving to Bing. Really Bing! Yahoo better get there act together!
